Key Match Events: Ben Stokes hit the winning run to finish unbeaten on 51
Sam Curran took 3-12 from his four overs
Adil Rashid finished with 2-22 including the vital wicket of Mohammad Haris with his first ball
Moeen Ali played a vital cameo role with Stokes but was bowled within five runs of victory
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler said Ben Stokes is the ultimate competitor and that he timed it perfectly to steer England home
Babar Azam congratulated England and said the team played incredibly in the last four matches
Ben Stokes said the way the team bowled, especially Adil Rashid and Sam Curran, won the game
Harry Brook said it was an incredibly special feeling to win the World Cup and showed how good the team is
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain did not disrupt the match despite forecasted heavy showers and possible storms
Sam Curran was chosen as the player of the tournament and player of the match
